name: SVG Icons
short_description: SVG Icons project has a goal to provide Open-Source reference implementation of SVG icon themes for leading Linux and UNIX Desktop Environments, in particular (but not limited to) KDE and GNOME Desktops environments, FXCE and LXDE.
